recipe.name: Pear Harlequin
recipe.notes: A recipe from the Sacramento Bee, well yellowed.

ingredient.ingredient_name: peeled, cored and diced Bartlett pears
grated peel and juice of 1 orange
grated peel and juice of 1 lemon

recipe.preparation: Combine pears, sugar, pineapple, grated orange peel and juice and grated lemon peel and juice.   Cover and let stand overnight.Next day, simmer fruit mixture slowly, stirring occasionally, until thick, about 1 hour.Add diced maraschino cherries and juice.  Pour into hot sterilized jars and seal
